description: Integrate a TurtleBot3 robot model with Gazebo simulation and ROS nodes, observe sensors, odometry, and TF topics.
expected_outcome: Launch Gazebo with the TB3 robot in the specified world
Robot model spawns with all links and joints correctly defined
Sensor topics (LIDAR, camera, IMU) publish correctly to ROS
Teleop or navigation nodes can be run and TF/odom topics observed
Students practice filling in missing blocks in URDF and launch files
